00008 #ifndef SERIALIZER_H_
00009 #define SERIALIZER_H_
00010 
00011 #include "../Object.h"
00012 
00013 SYLPH_BEGIN_NAMESPACE
00014 template<class T> class Array;
00015 class Dictionary;
00016 class String;
00017 SYLPH_PUBLIC
00018 class _serkey;
00019 
00020 enum SerializerType {
00021     S_Array,
00022     S_Dictionary,
00023     S_Singleton
00024 };
00025 
00026 template<SerializerType _type>
00027 class Serializer : public virtual Object {
00028 public:
00029     const SerializerType Type;
00030 public:
00031 
00032     Serializer() : type(_type) {}
00033     virtual ~Serializer();
00034 
00035     template<class T>
00036     virtual Serializer & operator<<(const T & t) = 0;
00037     template<>
00038     virtual Serializer & operator<< <unsigned int>(const unsigned int & i) = 0;
00039     virtual Serializer & operator<< <int>(const int & i) = 0;
00040     virtual Serializer & operator<< <unsigned long>(const unsigned long & l) = 0;
00041     virtual Serializer & operator<< <long>(const long & l) = 0;
00042     virtual Serializer & operator<< <float>(const float & f) = 0;
00043     virtual Serializer & operator<< <double>(const double & d) = 0;
00044     virtual Serializer & operator<< <bool>(const bool & b) = 0;
00045     template<class T>
00046     virtual Serializer & operator<< <Array>(const Array<T> & ar) = 0;
00047     virtual Serializer & operator<< <String>(const String & s) = 0;
00048     virtual Serializer & operator<< <Dictionary> (const Dictionary & dict) = 0;
00049     template<>
00050     virtual Serializer & operator<< <_serkey>(const _serkey & key) = 0;
00051 };
00052 
00053 template<>
00054 class Serializer<S_Array> : public virtual Object {
00055 
00056 };
00057 
00058 template<>
00059 class Serializer<S_Dictionary> : public virtual Object {
00060 
00061 };
00062 
00063 template<>
00064 class Serializer<S_Singleton> : public virtual Object {
00065 
00066 };
00067 SYLPH_END_NAMESPACE
00068 
00069 #endif  /* SERIALIZER_H_ */
